overview:
An entrepreneur since 2002, responsible for implementing top level scalable growth strategies for two start up companies leading to exits of a combined 14X return. Cost per lead/acquisition lead generation, affiliate marketing, media buying, focused networking, and advanced knowledge of the capital markets have been the primary force behind driving operations for each successful venture. Continually thrive on helping a project grow from the ground up, and watching my team achieve their goals. Extremely excited to be the CEO of iBid2Save.com, and look forward to executing our business plan with our chosen partners. ibid2save.com launched October 16th, 2011 and now has over 50,000 users as of August 2012 generating over $600,000 in revenue to date.

ibid2SAVE represents a significant advancement in the penny auction industry through its unique and self-reinforcing business model premised on delivering greater value and flexibility to consumers.
